Module eu.steffo.cleaver

Package eu.steffo.cleaver.logic.utils

A package containing utility classes.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SafeLongToInt
    An utility class to prevent overflows while casting Longs to Integers.
    SaltSerializer
    An utility class to serialize and deserialize byte arrays.
